execution_quality: Appropriate for the context—the agent listened to the user's concern and validated their reasoning without overcommitting to an implementation path.

No implementation work was required—the interaction served to validate reasoning and maintain alignment on design direction.
follow_up_pattern: User approval signals continuation with the current approach. Session likely ended or moved to next substantive task.
